content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), steam engine (position not specified), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The boiler is currently out of fuel and requires coal to generate steam.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0).

### Iron plate factory at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (5.0, -73.0).

### Lab at position(not specified)
Consists of a lab (position not specified) which is currently not receiving power.

### Pipe system
Consists of multiple pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 50557) at position (-11.5, 20.5) with full output status.
- PipeGroup (fluid system 50559) at position (-4.5, 21.5) with empty status.
- PipeGroup (fluid system 50561) at position (-4.5, 23.5) with empty status.

### Electricity network
Consists of multiple small electric poles:
- Small electric pole at position (-15.5, 25.5) and nearby poles at positions (-15.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 18.5), and others.

### Copper cable factory at position(not specified)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) which is currently not receiving power.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to insert items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into other entities. In this case, coal is needed for the boiler.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to a power source to avoid 'no power' status.
